name: Kensei: Sacred Fist
overview: Kensei explodes onto the 3D fighting scene, adding brand new concepts that give fight fans a totally different twist. Choose from 9 characters and battle your way through 10 different enemies including the ultimate boss and his bodyguard. Each time you fight you can unlock new hidden characters and techniques, 13 hidden fighters in all!! The fight of your life will take you across 10 exotic fighting arenas to the corners of the earth. 22 selectable fighters including hidden boss characters. 60 frames per second game speed. Dual Shock Analog Crontroller support Unique catch and counter button creates an all new game-style. State of the art graphics, super-smooth player textures. Hundreds of attacks and defensive moves.
